content.query:
INSERT INTO MonthlyCategorySales
SELECT
    pc.ProductCategoryID,
    pc.Name AS CategoryName,
    DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(soh.OrderDate), MONTH(soh.OrderDate), 1) AS OrderMonth,
    SUM(CAST(sod.OrderQty AS INT) * CAST(sod.UnitPrice AS MONEY)) AS TotalSalesAmount,
    SUM(CAST(sod.OrderQty AS INT)) AS TotalQuantitySold,
    COUNT(DISTINCT soh.SalesOrderID) AS NumOrders
FROM SalesLT.SalesOrderDetail sod
JOIN SalesLT.SalesOrderHeader soh ON sod.SalesOrderID = soh.SalesOrderID
JOIN SalesLT.Product p ON sod.ProductID = p.ProductID
JOIN SalesLT.ProductCategory pc ON p.ProductCategoryID = pc.ProductCategoryID
GROUP BY
    pc.ProductCategoryID,
    pc.Name,
    DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(soh.OrderDate), MONTH(soh.OrderDate), 1);



   select * from  MonthlyCategorySales;
